summary: An apprentice coffee salesman has a series of improbable and ironic adventures that seem designed to challenge his naive idealism.
cast: Malcolm McDowell|Ralph Richardson|Rachel Roberts|Arthur Lowe|Helen Mirren|Graham Crowden|Peter Jeffrey|Dandy Nichols|Mona Washbourne|Philip Stone|Mary MacLeod|Michael Bangerter|Wallas Eaton|Warren Clarke|Bill Owen|Michael Medwin|Vivian Pickles|Geoffrey Palmer|Geoffrey Chater|Anthony Nicholls|Brian Glover|Edward Judd|Pearl Nunez|Jeremy Bulloch|David Daker|Edward Peel|Alan Price|Colin Green|Clive Thacker|Dave Markee|Ian Leake|Bart Allison|Ben Aris|John Barrett|Margot Bennett|James Bolam|Sue Bond|Constance Chapman|Peter Childs|Frank Cousins|Brian Croucher|Alan Cullen|Paul Dawkins|Anna Dawson|Michael Elphick|Eleanor Fazan|Paul Healey|Geoffrey Hinsliff|Jo Jeggo|Patricia Lawrence|Stephanie Lawrence|Brian Lawson|Terence Maidment|Tuesday Miller|Christine Noonan|Kenneth Oxtoby|Stuart Perry|Brian Pettifer|Bill Pilkington|Cyril Renison|Irene Richmond|Roy Scammell|Peter Schofield|Frank Singuineau|Patsy Smart|David Sterne|Adele Strong|Hugh Thomas|Betty Turner|Glenn Williams|Catherine Willmer|Lindsay Anderson|Jill Goldston|Patricia Healey|Rachelle Miller|Philip Stewart|Reg Thomason|Kate Williams|Fred Wood
title: Un hombre de suerte
